    • Method Detail

      • bindTogether

        public void bindTogether(double[] projectedFaceVec)
        This method binds together the face vector and face matrix where last mentioned is a collection of already projected face vectors.
        Parameters:
        projectedFaceVec - the face vector that has been projected to R^k.

      • saveProjectedFaceMat

        public void saveProjectedFaceMat()
                          throws IOException
        Saves the projected face matrix to a .csv file.
        Throws:
        IOException - fails if PrintWriter fails.

      • randomProjection

        public double[] randomProjection(RandomMatrix RMatrix,
                                 int[] faceVec)
        This method projects the face vector to lower dimension R^k; in this case k = 500. This is done by using the operation called matrix multiplication on random matrix RMatrix and face vector faceVec.
        Parameters:
        RMatrix - random matrix
        faceVec - a corresponding vector for a face
        Returns:

      • getProjectedFaceMat

        public double[][] getProjectedFaceMat()
        A matrix that contains all the projected face vectors from the library
        Returns:
        projected face matrix

      • loadProjectedFaceMat

        public void loadProjectedFaceMat()
                          throws IOException
        This method reads the ProjectedFaceMatrix.csv -file if it exists and saves it in to a 2D double array.
        Throws:
        IOException - if PrintWriter fails

      • getFilepath

        public String getFilepath()
        File path to ProjectedFaceMatrix.csv
        Returns:
        filepath

      • setFilePath

        public void setFilePath(String filepath)
        Changes the matrix file path
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path to the ProjectedFaceMatrix.csv file
